name: Mitsuri Kanroji (Kimetsu No Yaiba) Lora
description:
LoRA of Mitsuri Kanroji from Kimetsu No Yaiba

I've tested it on Anything 4.5 and Midnight Mixer models

The main trigger word is (Kanroji_Mitsuri) but, as usual, you need to describe how you want her. Weight should be between 0.5 and 0.7. Any feedback is welcome!
